content: a half_double_crochet in the last stitch 3 turn and chain 1 half_double_crochet in the 1st stitch begin the 1st row of your feather stitches see row 3 of the special stitches you will have 7 feathers and work a half_double_crochet in the last stitch to end the row 4 turn and chain 1 half_double_crochet in the 1st stitch begin row 2 of the feather stitches and work 7 feathers across the row finish the row with a half_double_crochet in the last stitch 5 turn and chain 1 repeat row 4 until you have the desired length 6 to finish your scarf you will work a row of half_double_crochet s use the pictures to help you turn and ch1 half_double_crochet in the 1st stitch half_double_crochet in the chain-space and half_double_crochet in the top of the 1st feather stitch continue to work a half_double_crochet into each chain-space and feather stitch of the previous row ending with a half_double_crochet in the top of the last half_double_crochet of the previous row fasten_off and hide the ends
